recommendations.title: Expand Nike to SEC Powerhouses
recommendations.description: Add Auburn, LSU, and Texas A&M to Nike campaign. All 3 schools have 3+ high-engagement athletes ready to activate.
dataSupporting: Auburn has 4.5% avg engagement across volleyball/football
LSU baseball shows 2.3% engagement with strong follower base
Texas A&M already performing well with Nike - expand scope

recommendations.title: Activate 3 Unsponsored Tier 1 Athletes
recommendations.description: These athletes have engagement rates >4% but zero sponsorships. Quick wins with immediate revenue impact.
dataSupporting: Auburn Volleyball: 4.1% engagement, 67.5K followers, $0 current revenue
Baylor Gymnastics: 4.5% engagement, 92K followers, $0 current revenue
Penn State Football: 4.8% engagement, 285K followers, underutilized

recommendations.title: Scale Wegmans to ACC Conference
recommendations.description: Wegmans has strong performance in Mid-Atlantic. Expand to Virginia, potentially 2 more ACC schools in region.
recommendations.implementation: Regional expansion with local hero angles
dataSupporting: Virginia Track & Field: 1.6% engagement, perfect for regional brand
Geographic fit: ACC schools in Wegmans market territory
Current Wegmans campaign showing 89% positive sentiment

recommendations.title: Logo + Collab Content Strategy
recommendations.description: IP analysis shows 33% engagement lift when logo is present. Mandate logo in all brand activations.
dataSupporting: organizations_roster_ip_*.json: 33% avg logo lift across network
No downside - pure upside from simple content guideline

recommendations.title: Prioritize Rising Engagement Athletes
recommendations.description: Baylor Gymnastics shows 7-day engagement above 30-day average. Strike while momentum is high.
dataSupporting: Perfect timing for mid-market brand entry

implementationPriority.reason: Lower confidence, longer timeline, requires geographic expansion
